website_summaries.verdict: Choose it if you like that the keys can be used with the T-handle and other tools, but be aware of issues, including a lack of smaller sizes.
pros: A 31-piece set that comes with hex keys, bits, ratcheting T-handle, case
Handle offers good leverage, and the set is versatile
keys can be used w/drills and drivers
cons: The set has a lot of pieces but fewer hex keys than some of the competition
The tools fit somewhat loosely in the ratchet handle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I cant really comment on the durability, but my initial impression is that this is a great product for a great price. I'm also adding a picture of the back of the packaging that list all the sizes and other product details.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B.

customer_reviews.title: No labels for  sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set. I do wish it had smaller hex keys. I would give it five stars if the sizes were labeled. It is larger than I expected, picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: NotBob

customer_reviews.title: Make life easier, get this set to save time and energy
customer_reviews.text: Never use an Allen key that comes with something you buy again. This set makes assembling a piece of IKEA furniture a breeze. Granted, I don’t own any IKEA furniture, but there have been random things we’ve purchased around the house that require an Allen key and this ratcheting set is superb. All common sizes are included and the ratcheting function works as expected (actually a little better than expected). The long bits are very convenient and you will certainly be happy you have the extra reach in those times when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T.

customer_reviews.title: Great function, so-so value
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 5 stars because it is perfectly suited to snugging screws down good and tight, with less fatigue than a traditional screwdriver. However, I docked it a bit for value, durability and sturdiness. The ratchet mechanism does not feel precise; it feels like it has trash in it, and while it continues to work, I’m skeptical that this is not a precision made tool to last a lifetime. For the price paid, it could be better made. Still, a worth while tool which is welcome help for installing all new outlets and switches in my home.
customer_reviews.author: meep

customer_reviews.title: Too big and bulky woth bad design
customer_reviews.text: This set, although it says in description, was a lot bigger than I thought it would be. When I got the package, I was shocked with the size of the box. I opened the case to see a bunch of bits out of their spot and loose in case. I thought well maybe it was how it was through delivery and all, I was wrong. No matter how many times you put them in, they fall out of their spot and it was just a big disappointment. Dewalt is usually known for good construction and design but this was not that
customer_reviews.author: Adam Midura

customer_reviews.title: Get this to put things together. It delivers.
customer_reviews.text: I could not have assembled my IKEA furniture as quickly without. You know that silly S key IKEA provides? Toss it (into recycling) or make jewelry out of it. This is what you need. Only issue I have now, after a few months, is the ratcheting switch for direction feels...cheap. And the case clips that hold bits are...tough to use. Great set though to get started. Oh, don't go too crazy as you can strip/damage material you are driving into (aka IKEA composites).
customer_reviews.author: E.Ski

customer_reviews.title: Decent set but disappointed with labeling
customer_reviews.text: I have not yet given this set a real trial but seems to be a decent bit set. I have some other Dewalt bit sets that I've liked and this set is similar in quality. Not top quality but not junk. I really like the ratcheting handle if it holds up. My biggest gripe is the lousy labeling of the bits. The case itself has no labeling at all. Each bit has its size stamped into the bit itself but on the end that inserts into a driver where it can't be read. It can also be hidden when inserted in its case holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dwild

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought this ratcheting set before our toddler was born and I couldn't believe how many kid products require a hex key. He is now my hero for being able to put together and take apart multiple products purchased for the kid and home. I do agree the interior isn't very sturdy plastic, but I am not the most careful person and none of the plastic has broken in the 3 years of ownership
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave a second life to this Ratcheting T-Handle Set. I got it second hand and it was a great choice, the set is brand new and very functional. 31 pieces, covers basically all your needs. The material seems good, but it will not last forever. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase and I suggest looking for second-hand items for this kind of product.
customer_reviews.author: Satyr

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I rarely use this product. firstly, the ratchet handle stuck on my first use. I emailed the vendor of my experience no response till this day. The bits are rusting and they are pretty soft. I am disappointed in dewalt or I should say this product. I am a dewalt guy all day, but to this one didn't cut it. The design and the concept is smart but it's smarter to add quality to the product too.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great product unless you're working in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: It's well built with an extensive assortment of bits. The only complaint I have is that if you are trying to get into a spot where space is limited it's simply too big. It would be nice if they included a slim or mini ratchet handle as well for situations like this. That being said, the ratchet action is smooth, sturdy, and feels as though it will last for years. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality tool set that I have put under some stress since I purchased it a few months ago. My only negative is the way the handle is attached to the case. It is a pain to remove from the case and tricky to replace. The holder is strong and holds the handle in place, but is clumsy. The design of that feature could be better, but otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie41

customer_reviews.title: Speedy T handle driver
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of hex drivers and some screwdriver bits. The handle has two positions for bits. The main ratcheting one really nice. I use it a lot just for screws. The 1/8th bit was bent. Case is frigging huge but I can bag it along with my screwdriver set and drill bit set. Glad I have it tho maybe not the most complete nor professional but close enough I can't tell difference. Did buy more Dewalt sae bits and added in. Will add as situation demands.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Malone

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a swing set assembly and it has come in handy many times since!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this originally to aid in the assembly of our swing set this past October that had all allen heads. However, it has come in handy many times since then. The small ratcheting handle is a nice size that fits well in your hand, but at the same time is small enough to get into tight places. Most recently we had to do some work on our riding mower and this was perfect for getting into tight places without using those awful "L" shaped allen wrenches. Nice addition to the tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Stephin28

customer_reviews.title: Great hex key bits
customer_reviews.text: I love this set with both metric and SAE allen wrenches in both 1" and 6" lengths. The ratcheting T-handle is helpful particularly with allen screws that have been torqued down, but I mostly use the bits in my portable drill or impact driver. The long standard and Phillip's screwdriver bits will come in handy on some project but I haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: UncaDon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to more easily work on my bicycle. The case is much bigger than I expected and it works perfectly. Not more fiddling with small allen wrenches that are too short to reach or fully turn. The attachments are long so its easy to reach and have plenty of smash to do full turns.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price point, but likely wont last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the brand name, like others have said. The bits are fine and the handle works. The case is extremely cheap. Molded plastic that feels like it will crack. For the price point it is easily enough replaced, but its certainly not what I expected from DeWalt. Unrelated to DeWalt, the shipping from CPO is terrible. The box arrived crushed and the label barely attached. The product packaging was tore up but otherwise OK.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Handy set, works well for most jobs. The bits fit a bit loose but work and the case could be better. I buy a lot of Dewalt tools because of the quality and lifetime warranty. I had one of these bits break in half and I called Dewalt and they are sending me a whole new set! So 5 stars for Dewalt's customer service and honoring their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DWHT70265 Ratcheting T-Driver Set is a nice item.
customer_reviews.text: DEWALT DWHT70265 Ratcheting T-Drivet Set is excellent quality. The case is a little bigger than I thought but still fits in a small hand-carry tool box. A stubby ratcheting screwdriver also fits inside the plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Ratcheting Allen Wrench
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I've wanted. An allen wrench set that has a ratcheting handle. No more painful finger tips. This makes assembly of items much more pleasant. I've become a DeWalt fan in recent years and this is another fine product.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Cantelmo

customer_reviews.title: Work's great
customer_reviews.text: My husband, the builder, was very impressed that I purchased this tool kit. Even though it is for me, he uses it on small project around the house. This tool is perfect for working in smaller spaces where other tools are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Cat_page

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool set have used on the bike and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool set have used on the bike and many other things in the short time I've owned it. Will accept any other bits and fittings you may have from other tools. Handle provides a very strong mechanical advantage. Box is cheap but functions and the low price for the set, the whole thing is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Shaikun

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice set, great variety of bits and the ratchet ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice set, great variety of bits and the ratchet is comfortable and sturdy. I am giving this 3 stars due to the fact that it is not meant to be used on some heavy duty situations. When I trying to remove a fan blade, the metal bit twisted and stayed that way. Another time my bit snapped off inside the screw when trying to remove a bearing assembly. Those are the only two bad situations I have experienced out of all the times I’ve used this set. So overall, a good set when used on smaller things.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Ratcheting stiff
customer_reviews.text: Ratcheting counter clockwise is really stiff. I don’t know if mine is defective but still not happy with it. I hate the hassle of returning so I’ll hope with a bit of use it’ll loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Vox

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this same exact set at Home Depot about 5 years ago for work. I use them all the time and I wanted a set for my toolbox at home. I added a few personal items, such as small flat head and phillips head screwdriver bits and a 1/4" socket adapter to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: WireNut

customer_reviews.title: To make it even better though, I can plug in any of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Where has this set been my whole life!? This is exactly what I was looking for. A ratchet set for my allen wrenches. All the other attachments were just extra for me. To make it even better though, I can plug in any of my other many bits into the handle and use its ratchet function, which is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my toolset
customer_reviews.text: best investment yet and a welcome addition to my toolkit. my only issue personally is that the plastic holsters for the bits and the ratchet handle come out easily and are some times a pain to put back in. the kit itself was surprisingly large also, the pictures make it look very small.
customer_reviews.author: The G4mer

customer_reviews.title: E
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Have almost used it daily since purchasing. Length of bits makes for many tasks to completed easily. Bits also are conveniently used in my other drills and drivers. Ratcheting handle is quality and not flimsy. Contoured to fit in hand comfortably. Quality case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Made in China... and it shows
customer_reviews.text: I received this tonight. It is much flimsier than I expected from a Dewalt product. So I double checked the packaging: sure enough, it was made in China. It comes with a plastic bit holder to hold the metal bits in the ratchet. I bet that won't end well. Having said that, the set works so far but I don't expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Set - Long Hex Bits are useful for working on a motorcycle or car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. I've used it several times and am still happy with it. The long hex bits have proven very useful while workin on my motorcycle, and the bits are of typical Dewalt quality. The ratcheting handle is also very nice and so far I've not had any reliability issues, nor do I expect any. The case only gets 3 out of 5 stars however. The case internals feel cheap, and they aren't very user friendly. The tool itself is a 5 of 5, and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Poor case design
customer_reviews.text: Poor case design,Hard to get pieces out of case. Missing the smaller and important hex sizes. Sizes NOT LABELED on case or tools.Disappointing !.. Crappy handle stopped ratcheting after 2 days of use assembling furniture kits. This set is more like a no-name junk set rather than a Dewalt set..
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cala

customer_reviews.title: The assortment of bits and tools is great. Wish I would have had one of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely handy kit with long reach capability for almost any kind of project. The assortment of bits and tools is great. Wish I would have had one of these a couple of years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Schriv

customer_reviews.title: Throwing Out ALL My Allen Wrenches
customer_reviews.text: I have a Shopsmith (combination lathe, router, sander, band saw, planer, kitchen sink,,,,,,) and I needed a good way to tighten down the locking screws for all the pieces. Allen wrenches are basically stupid, because unless you use the small 'L' part you cannot get any leverage. In many instances, you don't have enough room. The handle on this makes it child's play. Nice setup.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schleis

customer_reviews.title: A great set
customer_reviews.text: Kicking myself in the rear for not getting something like this years ago. I have no idea how many sore hands and wrists I had putting stuff together with the cheap supplied allen wrenches in products and other times using the old L shaped tools. In just a few weeks it seems I use this at least once a day. Solidly put together.
customer_reviews.author: JNV

customer_reviews.title: Mighty T handle. Other wrenches are just an L...
customer_reviews.text: Super strong T handle. I lost these recently, but will buy another set.. case is ok, but inside is easy to organize.
customer_reviews.author: Kouri

customer_reviews.title: Huge Case! Great Handle!
customer_reviews.text: Wow didn't realize how big this was gonna be. Works great if you get forearm cramps from using standard style ratcheting screwdrivers.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool set.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool set! High quality and compact. I use it for working on my motorcycles, bicycles, and van all of the time. Made putting together new beds and furniture a piece of cake. I would definitely recommend them to anyone. The handle ratchets or can be locked in place like a traditional screwdriver. The handle fits my hand great too; even with gloves on.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Most common bits.
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of bits in convenient case. Ratcheting "T" handle gives easy torque and speed. Small storage of many common bits.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Should have gotten this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Buy this set and make your life easier when putting together almost any modern piece of store bought furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Yoduh

customer_reviews.title: Great work DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sets of interchangeable tips, the ratchet works really well, it is a very good product for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Leviatan64

customer_reviews.title: Took two kits to assemble one acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. First order received - ratchet handle would bind at the same point, each rotation, both directions. Replacement does the same, but less severe - bearable. Replacement long bits were not straight. Took two kits to assemble one acceptable. If I found something similar I would return the second kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Al68

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, case seems too big of space commitment
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. The case seems really large for what it stores, especially if adding it to tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Marks

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of tools
customer_reviews.text: The tools themselves seem to be of satisfactory so far. The storage box is nice to have, the little plastic pieces that holds the tools in is a little flimsy, I don't think they will survive much abuse. I would have given 5 stars if they had filled up all of the tool slots, there are a few popular bits that would be nice to have, especially more Torx bits. For the price paid I think overall it is a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great  deal just make sure the size you need is included
customer_reviews.text: I live the quality and the fact it comes in an organized hard case I wish they size range was broader but for the money you get a great start with the basic sizes in 3 different lengths
customer_reviews.author: danny wilkins

customer_reviews.title: We use to build the chairs with the provided allen wrench in each chair and those things suck. I bought this tool and love it to
customer_reviews.text: I work at Staples and often times when a person buys a desk chair from us they opt for the store assembly. We use to build the chairs with the provided allen wrench in each chair and those things suck. I bought this tool and love it to death. I can whip out a chair in 8-10 mins. Much faster than before.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good but.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the ratcheting mechanism works good the only downfall is the magnet isn’t strong enough and the bits don’t click in. The bits fall out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Dealt DWHT70265 Ratcheting Allen Wrenches with Handles
customer_reviews.text: A friend needed a set of Allen Wrenches in a case for home repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ratchet
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome little tool. I added a 1/4 socket adapter ($4 bucks) with a set of sockets for basic automotive repair and random projects. Not sure it will hit 500lbs torque, but overall the ratchet is solid. I used it almost extensively to change my breaks and this tool had no problem doing the job. The ratchet also has a 1/4" bit adapter on the side handle; you can used one of the included long bits as a breaker bar for extra torque.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Collins

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt never disappoints me
customer_reviews.text: Very solid set. I prefer these to the rounded tip ones (those tend to get stuck on the allen bolts). Has all the right sizes for my needs. Handy, well made storage case. Ratchet is very handy. It's now my favorite screw driver, too. I added a magnetic adapter (which fits nicely in the case) so I can use any of the bits with my battery drills.
customer_reviews.author: Ol buck

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of Chinese knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is a Chinese knock off. Poor quality case and ratchet handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rich in N Idaho

customer_reviews.title: Good tools; awful awful awful case
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say this about that: the case is awful. Awful, awful, awful. Are we clear? Awful. The tools are fine (and got put to use the same day they were delivered), but the case is seriously awful. The sliding mechanism to keep it closed is crap, and the inside of the case itself is not designed well. at. all. Just one more example: the bits do not pivot up. Noooo. You gotta try to finesse them out of their storate area, or live the whole bloody black thing out of its recessed spot. WAY WAY WAY too fiddly. Did I mention the case is awful?
customer_reviews.author: just another geek

customer_reviews.title: it is way better, constructed well
customer_reviews.text: The description and photo do not do this Dewalt T-Handle set justice...it is way better, constructed well, very useful and enhances the work flow when working on my motorcycle and in my garage
customer_reviews.author: Mal4

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it's available if ever I need another one.
customer_reviews.text: I work as an electrician. I spend a lot of time with screwdrivers. This makes it far less fatiguing on my arm when landing a panel. A bit heavier than I had expected but it's solidly built.
customer_reviews.author: Taz969

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: DeWalt tools. Good quality and has every size that I need.
customer_reviews.author: BMc

customer_reviews.title: Could have had more.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item as a gift and had good expectations however as it seems to be a trend lately this kit contains many duplicate bits. I can understand two or three of the same bits but I would like to see more of a variety. I ended up taking out most of the duplicates and customizing the case. As for the case it is well built in the same fashion of the smaller Dewalt cases that hold the drill/screwdriving bits with the only downfall as anyone who has used these cases knows is the difficulty of replacing the items sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosey

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: The bits are strong and the case is solid, I just wish the coating on the tools was a bit better. I used 4 bit just last week and the 4 I used are already showing sign of moderate tarnish or rust. I wasn't using any chemical of solvent either. I assume it is just from sweat and oils from my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought one set for my son and one set for myself and we both love the quality and usefulness of these.
customer_reviews.author: Opie

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks durable as heck. It's a Dewalt. The only thing I was so-so about is that I didn't get any drivers small enough to work on my EDC (which is why I ordered them), but the quality was so good I gave them 5 stars anyways and happily put them in the tool box. I'm also eager to see how the vertical grip ratcheting T handle does as a basic screwdriver (and it comes with screwdriver options).
customer_reviews.author: Blue Canoe

customer_reviews.title: Outperformed expectation!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for terminating up to 300kcmil wires in panels. I can turn lug nuts we’ll past torque ratings and the ratchet holds well past what I expected it to. Wish they made one with 3/8” and 1/2”!
customer_reviews.author: Micah R.

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the ratchet feature and have recommended to friends
customer_reviews.text: This T-handle set was exactly what I was looking for as I needed the length for various screws on my motorcycle. I especially like the ratchet feature and have recommended to friends. Seem very durable and long lasting and the case makes them extremely portable opposed to others that rest on a stand that you have to drag around.
customer_reviews.author: delite916

customer_reviews.title: No more allen wrenches!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these as Christmas gifts. Both people commented about how they have never seen these in the store, which is exactly why I bought them. The only problem...I should have gotten one for myself as well. Really really nice kit, this tool is very handy. Allen wrenches are a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for IKEA
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my handyman, after his hand got sore building furniture with only an Allen wrench. Highly recommend this for IKEA furniture.
customer_reviews.author: jmm521

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Allen head tools. Fits into my drill hreat
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Beats crappy L shaped tools
customer_reviews.text: Used quite a few times and like most dewalt products it holds up pretty well if your not abusing them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Good As Expected, Plus
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have in my toolset, and its only limit is reaching/using in tight spots. I have not been able to utilize it yet in a production setting, but will report back if problems arise. By the way, shop this locally first. Found it for several dollars less at home depot the day after this shipped. Oh well. still on the whole, saving the trip for this alone is almost worth it at my local HD...
customer_reviews.author: Fred C Quimby

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Should have read more about it. Not really for home use. All I wanted was an Allen wrench set.
customer_reviews.author: flyers340

customer_reviews.title: Good mix (long & short shaft) of somewhat unusual bits.
customer_reviews.text: Good mix (long & short shaft) of somewhat unusual bits. Nice case. Ratchet handle works well.
customer_reviews.author: Goodtime Charlie, VA

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set and would give it five stars if ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set and would give it five stars if the case wasn't so annoying. It takes more time than it should to remove and replace the bits and I've had it basically fall apart on me twice already (in about 5 uses). Its annoying, but I'd still buy it again.. I love Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Hand Luke

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt DWHT70265 31 Piece Ratcheting T Handle Hex Key Set
customer_reviews.text: The Dewalt DWHT70265 31 Piece Ratcheting T Handle Hex Key Set is constructed in the high-quality Dewalt manner you would expect. Tons of bit options and comes altogether in a nice case. It doesn't say, but the handle also has a "fixed" bit end, opposite of the ratcheting side in case you might need it. Although the ratchet can be locked in a fixed position also. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Must have.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the truck as part of my emergency kit. Definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.author: David Salvato

customer_reviews.title: No lock
customer_reviews.text: It's a great item, the only down side i have an issue with is that it does not lock the bit that is inserted, so chances are that it will leave the bit with what your driving in.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a standard set!
customer_reviews.text: This is been an invaluable tool especially for bicycle service. I keep it in the garage right next to all of our bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Usually put the bits in a drill, but in a tight spot, the T is great.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set! I will recommend it to any tech or anything you need it for -- a nice go to set.
customer_reviews.author: Noon MD

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a Friend, but is very handy and it's Allen bits are very strong
customer_reviews.author: Sr Dimas

customer_reviews.title: The quality any durability is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tools and use them for anything I can. They're very comfortable and the case keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great wheelchair tool set
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. T-handle ratchet broke on the first set I ordered return was easy and order a new set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Only DeWalt tool I have ever found that my brother in law did not already own. This is the best thing I have ever seen for putting together bar stools. We put six new ones together and rebuilt four, the week before I found it, darn.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Drill bits are very soft
customer_reviews.text: The set is neat, but the Chinese steel is garbage. All the Phillips bits bend just by looking at them.
customer_reviews.author: alex stepanyuk

customer_reviews.title: Very useful overall
customer_reviews.text: I use tools regularly on my job as a commercial furniture installer. I like the variety of sizes and I like the fact it takes up very little space. I don't like the other accessories besides the actual bits.
customer_reviews.author: Stephon Henderson

customer_reviews.title: ) The black plastic holders on the inside of the case are a little flimsy but the case itself is solid and the tools are great!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a long time since I bought a tool set that made my life so much easier :) The black plastic holders on the inside of the case are a little flimsy but the case itself is solid and the tools are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set is great, but the problem it has is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Set is great, but the problem it has is that it doesn't come with very small bits like ones needed to unscrew bathroom accessories. Other then that it is a great set and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L

customer_reviews.title: Take it easy with this handle.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of bits,strong. The t-handle doesn't stand up to much torque though. Mine crapped out after about 10 hrs of ordinary work. Won't ratchet anymore. Oh well. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: mrjmares

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to tool box
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. Not sure how i lived without it
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I use T-Handles alot for work and this speeds up the process. These are strong and durable. I use them with the handle and my impact driver. I now own 2 sets and guys at work are buying them too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDave

customer_reviews.title: They are convenient as far as size but the ratcheting handle is awesome. Ran some tests around the house tightening furntiure
customer_reviews.text: Just received the set for work because I'm tired of allen keys. They are convenient as far as size but the ratcheting handle is awesome. Ran some tests around the house tightening furntiure. It just feels good. My only problem is there are no 2 and 2.5 bits. That's 5/64 and 3/32. Dewalt is 2 bit sizes away from 5 stars. But nonetheless the set is a MUST have.
customer_reviews.author: MeRph1

customer_reviews.title: Rediclous Packaging
customer_reviews.text: After spending what seemed like 20 min. ripping the plastic off the set and then the "T" handle I lost interest and ended up using my old allen wrenches. Why these products have to be wrapped like this instead of put in an ordinary box I don't understand.
customer_reviews.author: queenie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good deal. I use Dewalt products quite frequently and have found then reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tools
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tools! They helped me big time while I was assembling the chairs we just bought for our dining room... The ratchet is VERY handy, definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto A Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Really like this set
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set, made well. I use the 6" extensions for grip and stock bolts. Anywhere else this would have cost twice what I paid for it. It's a great compliment to my Wheeler screwdriver bit set.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful set. I have not used it much but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set. I have not used it much but the little I have it was a huge time saver in putting a bike together. The hand tool works very well and the bits look like quality metal that should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Securus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tool
customer_reviews.text: After screwing around with the included Allen key that the furniture I was building came with I went and grabbed this off my workbench. The ratchet head and t style handle made assembly much easier.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Unfortunately whatever metal they used is a rust magnet
customer_reviews.author: ccmclast

customer_reviews.title: Bits damage easily
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent set, but the quality of the bits isn't what I expected. It was surprisingly easy to damage the Phillips bit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Muschick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought it was going to be but it is a fine tool.I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron  Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Up to Dewalt standards. Convenient and case is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Up to Dewalt standards. Convenient and case is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: WileyTweety

customer_reviews.title: Work great and it's unique in that the Allen inserts can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE item for every handyman. Work great and it's unique in that the Allen inserts can be removed from the handle. I like everything about this product. It saved me considerable time putting together a table purchased from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I like the carrying case
customer_reviews.text: The few times I have them used they worked well. I do not use them often I will continue to follow them. I like the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilis R.

customer_reviews.title: ... plenty of different sizes and the ratcheting feature is awesome. But I feel like the but kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with plenty of different sizes and the ratcheting feature is awesome. But I feel like the but kind of fits loosely in the sense where if you waive the handle around the but might fall out not much pressure needed to pull in or out
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: What can i say, it's Dewalt. As described, great quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Successtrend

product_meta.title: DEWALT DWHT70265 Ratcheting T-Handle Set, 31 Piece
product_meta.description: Dewalt DWHT70265 Ratcheting T-Handle Set, 31 Piece The 31 pc. Ratcheting T Handle Hex Key Set features a compact and convenient tray allowing for easy storage. The set is extremely versatile with it's variety of bits making this product functional for any job type.
